name: Generic Space Shooter (itch) (Mr. Shellduck)
description:
Greetings, welcome to the millionth generic space shooter. There isn't anything special about this one, but you can play it if you want to.

There are currently three enemy types:

Chasers are the basic enemies, they just chase you around.

Ballistics are slow, but fire extremely quick projectiles.

Behemoths are huge (hence the name), move slightly slower than Chasers, and take several hits to defeat. Upon death, they will release projectiles in eight directions.

There are currently two different power-ups:

Area Shot lets you fire projectiles in eight directions for a short time.

Super Projectile pierces through Chasers, kills Ballistics and Behemoths in one hit, and gives double points for enemy kills.

Use the arrow keys to move, press X to shoot, and press ESC to quit.

If you press "E" on the game over screen, you will be surprised.
